cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP data port for CU to 0 will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting maximum MIMO layers to an invalid high value (99) will cause physical layer configuration errors and prevent proper MIMO transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為無效的高值 (99)，會導致實體層配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 MIMO 傳輸設定。
